description: Complete system overview documenting the visual requirements whiteboard architecture, core components, and high-level data flow between client and server
Detailed documentation of the node types, relationships, workspaces, and templates data models including validation rules and relationships between entities
Documentation of core graph algorithms including domain layout system, relationship management, cycle detection, and auto-layout implementations
Detailed documentation of the AI generation service, context injection, template matching algorithms, and the generation queue system
Technical documentation of the unique domain ring visualization system including sector calculations, node positioning, and hierarchy management
